name: World Of Run
description:
World Of Run - the wonderful world of run! Play free 3D! Check your dexterity and reaction speed, compete with your friends, play and enjoy!
World Of Run - the best runner OF THE 2014 YEAR!
Features:
- Huge colorful world full of adventure and danger
- Dynamic gameplay
- Simple controls (tap)
- Flexible system improvements
- System destruction of obstacles
- Energetic music and pleasant sounds

How to play:
  The mood in the menu music volume and the level of graphics.
  After accumulating flyers, start pump their characteristics.
  Gameplay includes:
- Single jump (tap)
- Double jump (doubletap)
- Double jump to the mega-hit (doubletap + before heading tap).
"Jump pits and obstacles, collect leaflets, flyers knocks additional obstacles, set records in distance race, develop your character!
All this and more awaits you in the best free game 2014 - WORLD OF RUN!!!
